member.name: T:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR
member.summary: Represents an Asprise OCR engine. Read the developer's guide here.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.SPEED_FASTEST
member.summary: Highest speed, accuracy may suffer - default option

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.SPEED_FAST
member.summary: less speed, better accuracy

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.SPEED_SLOW
member.summary: lowest speed, best accuracy

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.RECOGNIZE_TYPE_TEXT
member.summary: Recognize text

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.RECOGNIZE_TYPE_BARCODE
member.summary: Recognize barcode

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.RECOGNIZE_TYPE_ALL
member.summary: Recognize both text and barcode

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.OUTPUT_FORMAT_PLAINTEXT
member.summary: Output recognition result as plain text

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.OUTPUT_FORMAT_XML
member.summary: Output recognition result in XML format with additional information if coordination, confidence, runtime, etc.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.OUTPUT_FORMAT_PDF
member.summary: Output recognition result as searchable PDF

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.OUTPUT_FORMAT_RTF
member.summary: Output to editable format RTF (can be edited in MS Word)

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.LANGUAGE_ENG
member.summary: eng (English)

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.LANGUAGE_SPA
member.summary: spa (Spanish)

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.LANGUAGE_POR
member.summary: por (Portuguese)

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.LANGUAGE_DEU
member.summary: deu (German)

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.LANGUAGE_FRA
member.summary: fra (French)

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.START_PROP_DICT_SKIP_BUILT_IN_DEFAULT
member.summary: set to 'true' to skip using the default built in dict. Default value: 'false' - can only be used for StartEngine

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.START_PROP_DICT_SKIP_BUILT_IN_ALL
member.summary: set to 'true' to skip using all built-in dicts. Default value: 'false' - can only be used for StartEngine

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.START_PROP_DICT_CUSTOM_DICT_FILE
member.summary: Path to your custom dictionary (words are separated using line breaks). Default value: null. - can only be used for StartEngine

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.START_PROP_DICT_CUSTOM_TEMPLATES_FILE
member.summary: Path to your custom templates (templates are separated using line breaks). Default value: null. - can only be used for StartEngine

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_DICT_DICT_IMPORTANCE
member.summary: Percentage measuring the importance of the dictionary (0: not at all; 100: extremely important; default: 10)

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PAGE_TYPE
member.summary: Page type

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PAGE_TYPE_AUTO_DETECT
member.summary: Page type value: auto

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PAGE_TYPE_SINGLE_BLOCK
member.summary: Page type value: a single block of text

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PAGE_TYPE_SINGLE_COLUMN
member.summary: Page type value: a single column of text

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PAGE_TYPE_SINGLE_LINE
member.summary: Page type value: a single line of text

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PAGE_TYPE_SINGLE_WORD
member.summary: Page type value: a single word

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PAGE_TYPE_SINGLE_CHARACTOR
member.summary: Page type value: a single char

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PAGE_TYPE_SCATTERED
member.summary: Page type value: scattered text

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_LIMIT_TO_CHARSET
member.summary: Limit charset to a set of predefined chars

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_OUTPUT_SEPARATE_WORDS
member.summary: Set to 'true' to set the output level as word instead of the default, line.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_INPUT_PDF_DPI
member.summary: The DPI to be used to render the PDF file; default is 300 if not specified

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_IMG_PREPROCESS_TYPE
member.summary: Image pre-processing type

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_IMG_PREPROCESS_TYPE_DEFAULT
member.summary: Use system default

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_IMG_PREPROCESS_TYPE_DEFAULT_WITH_ORIENTATION_DETECTION
member.summary: Default + page orientation detection

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_IMG_PREPROCESS_TYPE_CUSTOM
member.summary: Custom, need to set PROP_IMG_PREPROCESS_CUSTOM_CMDS

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_IMG_PREPROCESS_CUSTOM_CMDS
member.summary: Custom mage pre-processing command

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_TABLE_SKIP_DETECTION
member.summary: table will be detected by default; set this property to true to skip detection.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_TABLE_MIN_SIDE_LENGTH
member.summary: default is 31 if not specified

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_SAVE_INTERMEDIATE_IMAGES_TO_DIR
member.summary: Save intermediate images generated for debug purpose - don't specify or empty string to skip saving

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PDF_OUTPUT_FILE
member.summary: PDF output file - required for PDF output. Valid prop value: absolute path to the target output file.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PDF_OUTPUT_IMAGE_DPI
member.summary: The DPI of the images or '0' to auto-detect. Optional. Valid prop value: 0(default: auto-detect), 300, 200, etc.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PDF_OUTPUT_FONT
member.summary: Font to be used for PDF output. Optional. Valid values: "serif" (default), "sans".

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PDF_OUTPUT_TEXT_VISIBLE
member.summary: Make text visible - for debugging and analysis purpose. Optional. Valid prop values false(default), true.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PDF_OUTPUT_IMAGE_FORCE_BW
member.summary: Convert images into black/white to reduce PDF output file size. Optional. Valid prop values: false(default), true.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PDF_OUTPUT_RETURN_TEXT
member.summary: Set to 'text' or 'xml' to return information when the output format is PDF

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PDF_OUTPUT_RETURN_TEXT_FORMAT_PLAINTEXT
member.summary: Return text

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PDF_OUTPUT_RETURN_TEXT_FORMAT_XML
member.summary: Return xml

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PDF_OUTPUT_PDFA
member.summary: Set to true to output PDF/A instead of normal PDF.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_PDF_OUTPUT_PDFA_FONT_FILE
member.summary: Optionally specifies path to the custom font to be embedded in PDF/A

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_RTF_OUTPUT_FILE
member.summary: RTF output file - required for RTF output. Valid prop value: absolute path to the target output file.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_RTF_PAPER_SIZE
member.summary: default is LETTER, may set to A4.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_RTF_OUTPUT_RETURN_TEXT
member.summary: Return text in 'text' or 'xml' format when the output format is set to RTF.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_RTF_OUTPUT_RETURN_TEXT_FORMAT_PLAINTEXT
member.summary: Return text

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PROP_RTF_OUTPUT_RETURN_TEXT_FORMAT_XML
member.summary: Return xml

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.PAGES_ALL
member.summary: Recognize all pages.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.CONFIG_PROP_SEPARATOR
member.summary: Do not change unless you are told so.

member.name: F:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.CONFIG_PROP_KEY_VALUE_SEPARATOR
member.summary: Do not change unless you are told so.

member.name: M:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.StartEngine(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Starts the OCR engine; does nothing if the engine has already been started.
member.param: e.g., "eng"
e.g., "fastest"
property specifications, can be a single Dictionary object or inline specification in pairs. Valid property names are defined in this class, e.g., START_PROP_DICT_CUSTOM_DICT_FILE, etc.

member.name: M:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.StopEngine
member.summary: Stops the OCR engine; does nothing if it has already been stopped.

member.name: M:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.Recognize(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Performs OCR on the given input files.
member.param: comma ',' separated image file path (JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIFF)
-1 for all pages or the specified page (first page is 1) for multi-page image format like TIFF
-1 for whole page or the starting x coordinate of the specified region
-1 for whole page or the starting y coordinate of the specified region
-1 for whole page or the width of the specified region
-1 for whole page or the height of the specified region
valid values: RECOGNIZE_TYPE_TEXT, RECOGNIZE_TYPE_BARCODE or RECOGNIZE_TYPE_ALL.
valid values: OUTPUT_FORMAT_PLAINTEXT, OUTPUT_FORMAT_XML, OUTPUT_FORMAT_PDF or OUTPUT_FORMAT_RTF.
additional properties, can be a single Dictionary object or inline specification in pairs. Valid property names are defined in this class, e.g., PROP_INCLUDE_EMPTY_BLOCK, etc.
member.returns: text (plain text, xml) recognized for OUTPUT_FORMAT_PLAINTEXT, OUTPUT_FORMAT_XML

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:asprise_ocr_api.Properties.Resources.aocr_xsl
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method='html' version='1.0' encoding='utf-8' indent='yes'/> <xsl:template match="/asprise-ocr"> <HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>Asprise OCR Result of <xsl:value-of select="@input"/> </TITLE> <style> body {background-color:lightgray; font-family: arial;} div.page {background-color: white; border: outset 3px #666;} div.pageNo {position: absolute; right [rest of string was truncated]";.
